brand_identity.name: Mathallen Malmö
brand_identity.emotional_tone: Inviting, Trustworthy, Local, energetic but grounded

usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope for all headings (h1-h6). Weight: SemiBold (600) to ExtraBold (800). Letter-spacing: tight for large text.
usage_rules.body: Use Public Sans for all body text. Weight: Regular (400) or Medium (500). Line-height: relaxed (1.6).
usage_rules.accents: Use uppercase + wide tracking (0.1em) for eyebrows/labels.

rules.backgrounds: Use Stone-50 (#FAFAF9) as the main page background. Pure white (#FFFFFF) only for cards/surfaces.
rules.text: Never use pure black. Use Stone-900 (#1C1917) for headings and Stone-600 (#57534E) for body.
rules.accents: Use Orange-500 for primary actions. Use Amber-400 for 'Offer/Discount' tags.

textures.organic_noise: Use a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on the main background to reduce digital sterility.

layout_strategies.marketing_hero: Bento Grid (Mode A). Mix of 3 shapes: Hero Image (Family shopping), Text Block (Welcome), Side Block (Weekly Highlight).
layout_strategies.offers_grid: Masonry-style grid for 'Weekly Offers'. Cards should look like digital coupons with dashed borders or 'ticket' notches.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Section gap: py-20 or py-32. Element gap: gap-6 or gap-8.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-orange-600 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-stone-900 border border-stone-200 hover:bg-stone-50 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium

cards.feature: bg-white rounded-2xl p-8 border border-stone-100 shadow-sm hover:border-orange-200 transition-colors group
cards.offer: bg-yellow-50 rounded-xl p-6 border-2 border-dashed border-yellow-200 relative overflow-hidden

navigation.style: Floating glass header. bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-stone-100/50.

media.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Style: Stroke width 1.5px (Thin/Elegant). Color: Stone-600 or Orange-500 for accents.

instructions_to_main_agent: Install fonts: Manrope and Public Sans from Google Fonts via simple CSS import in index.css.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' hero section on the homepage as the first visual anchor.
The 'Weekly Offers' page must feel like a digital flyer—use the dashed border style defined in components.
Use the specific Hex codes provided in colors.palette. Do NOT use default Tailwind colors.
Ensure the Admin Panel shares the same DNA but uses a denser layout (Mode B grid).
For the Map: Use a styled Google Maps iframe (grayscale or desaturated) to match the site aesthetic.
Do NOT build e-commerce features (cart, checkout). All 'Buy' buttons should be 'View Offer' or 'Find in Store'.
Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (e.g., Contact Form success).
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
